quests.description: Transport 15 passengers to Orion Prime. The passengers are a group of scientists heading to a research conference.
quests.backstory: A group of renowned scientists are traveling to Orion Prime for a groundbreaking conference on interstellar travel. Ensure their safe passage.

quests.description: Deliver a mysterious package to Sigma Outpost. The contents are unknown, but the reward is high.
quests.backstory: A shadowy figure has hired you to deliver a mysterious package to Sigma Outpost. The contents are unknown, but the reward is too good to pass up.

quests.description: Transport medical supplies to Nova Haven. The colony is in desperate need of medical aid.
quests.backstory: Nova Haven is suffering from a severe medical crisis. Deliver the much-needed supplies to save lives and earn a hefty reward.

quests.description: Transport raw materials to Epsilon Station. The station is expanding and needs resources.
quests.backstory: Epsilon Station is undergoing a major expansion. Transport the necessary raw materials to support their growth.
